name: Natalie de Weerd
role: Lead Deveoper & AI Expert at Altavia.UK
bio: As Altavia UK's self-proclaimed "Queen Nerd," Natalie leads the dev team and AI strategy, cutting through the buzz to deliver smart, sustainable, and genuinely useful solutions. Her role encompasses overseeing a wide spectrum of digital projects that flow through the organization, from conceptualisation to execution, all while keeping abreast of the latest industry tech & trends.
